goal.ch: "大氣動力學是大氣科學系的必修課, 是重要的課程之一, 目的在提供大學部學生關於大氣運動的基本控制方程式及動力的瞭解."

outline.ch:
"Ch1. Introduction.
Ch2. Basic Conservation Laws.
Ch3. Elementary Applications of the Basic Equations.
Ch4. Circulation and Vorticity and Potential Vorticity.
Ch5. Atmospheric Oscillations.
Ch6. Quasi-geostrophic Analysis.
Ch7. Baroclinic Development.
Ch8. The Planetary Boundary Layer.
Ch9. Mesoscale Circulations.
Ch10.  The General Circulation.
Ch11.  Tropical Dynamics.
(Ch1 to 5 in fall symester, Ch6 to 10 or 11 in spring symester)."

textbook.en: "An Introduction to Dynamic Meteorology.  Authored by James R. Holton and Gregory J. Hakim, Fifth Edition, pp. 532.  Available from 台北圖書公司, 台北市羅斯福路三段335號6樓, 02-23620811."
